awd_titl_txt: NSF Workshop on National Ocean Mission Enterprises:  For    Developing Ocean Resources in the U.S. EEZ
awd_abstract_narration: This action provides support of a workshop that brings together                 industry, government and academia to develop a "blueprint" for an               "economic engine" that will focus and drive this Nation's                       technological advances for the development of the resources of                  the U.S. Exclusive Economic Zone.  To date, the potentially great               rewards from development of EEZ resources by the private sector                 have been greatly inhibited by the scale of risks of such                       candidate projects.  This workshop will consider a wide range of                incubator mechanisms that would promote such ventures or                        enterprises by combining the resources and efforts of government,               industry, academic, and public interest groups.
